subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A proud and consistent franchise for decades, the Giants have plummeted to 0-6 for the first time since 1976 as injuries, bloated contracts and a lack of depth have taken a toll.
snippet: A proud and consistent franchise for decades, the Giants have plummeted to 0-6 for the first time since 1976 as injuries, bloated contracts and a lack of depth have taken a toll.
